 Initializes a newly allocated _CPFillGradient object with the provided gradient.
Drawing

 Draws the gradient into the given graphics context inside the provided rectangle.
(void) - fillPathInContext:
 Draws the gradient into the given graphics context clipped to the current drawing path.

Detailed Description

Draws CPGradient area fills.

Drawing methods are provided to fill rectangular areas and arbitrary drawing paths.

Member Function Documentation
